title: Submission of the Gazette Notifications for Approval of Parliament
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Minister of Finance for submission of the Gazette Notifications issued in terms of the provisions of the following Acts, in Parliament was approved by the Cabinet.

i.	Six (06) Gazette Notifications issued under the Ports and Airports Development Levy Act, No.18 of  2011.

ii.	Nine (09) Gazette Notifications issued under the Excise (Special Provisions) Act, No.13 of 1989.
iii.	Ten (10) Gazette Notifications issued under the Excise Ordinance (Chapter 52):

iv.	One (01) Gazette Notification issued under the Finance Act, No.11 of 2006:

v.	One (01) Gazette Notification issued under the Finance Act, No.12 of 2012:

vi.	Five (05) Gazette Notifications issued under the Finance Act, No.35 of 2018:

vii.	Six (06) Gazette Notifications issued under the Revenue Protection Act, No.19 of 1962:

viii.	Three (03) Gazette Notifications issued under the Customs Ordinance (Chapter 235):

ix.	Thirty One (31) Gazette Notifications issued under the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007:

x.	Five (05) Gazette Notifications issued under the Foreign Exchange Act, No.12 of 2017:
